# title

**Instance Property**

The title of the collaboration highlight.

## Declaration

```swift
var title: String? { get }
```

## Discussion

The app that hosts the collaboration provides this title.

## Accessing collaboration attributes

- **collaborationIdentifier**: A unique identifier that the app hosting the collaboration provides.
- **contentType**: The UTI type for this collaboration highlight.
- **creationDate**: The date the system creates this file.
